data.title: Square 2 Square Bicycle Ride
data.text:
Our team looks forward to offering both in-person and "do it yourself" ride options for the 2024 spring and fall Square 2 Square Bike Rides. As an alternative to in-person, a DIY ride option will be offered over the period of a month. With the goals of providing an event for new people on bikes, promoting safe riding, showcasing the Razorback Greenway, and supporting our neighbors, S2S has choices for you!

2024 Dates

May 4, 2024 - Fayetteville 2 Bentonville

September 21, 2024 - Bentonville 2 Fayetteville

Registration

Registration is open for the fall ride.

Fall Ride Information

When: Saturday, September 21, 2024

Where: Bentonville to Fayetteville (via the Razorback Greenway)

Start: Sam's Club Home Office in Bentonville

Finish: Walker Park in Fayetteville

Packet Pickup

Thursday, September 19 and Friday, September 20 | Bentonville and Fayetteville, 11am-6pm

Bentonville: Bentonville Community Center | 1101 SW Citizens Cir

Fayetteville: Adventure Subaru | 2269 N Henbest Dr

Remaining packets will be available at the start of the ride on Saturday morning.

Shuttles

Shuttles are available for $10.00 per rider. All shuttles (pre and post bike ride options) take people and their bikes to the start.

Pre-ride shuttle times are 6am, 7am, and 8am. Post-ride shuttle times are 11:30 a.m., 12:30 p.m., 1:30 p.m. and 2:30 p.m.

Shuttle registration is now open. Shuttles are limited in space to just 45-50 riders.

Pick Up is at Walker Park in Fayetteville (Along Block Ave - near Splash Pad)

Drop off is at Sam's Club Home Office in Bentonville (2101 SE Simple Savings Dr, Bentonville, AR 72712)

Hotels

A courtesy block has been set up with the Staybridge Suites in Fayetteville for the weekend of the spring and fall Square 2 Square Bike Rides. You can reserve a room directly with the hotel online or by calling the hotel direct at 479.695.2400.

Book for the spring ride through this booking link. Discounted rates available for reservations made prior to 04/04/24. Book for the fall ride through this booking link. Reservations must be made prior to 08/20/24 and will apply to Friday (Sept 20) and/or Saturday (Sept 21).

Do it Yourself (DIY) Ride

The DIY ride will take place September 1-30, when weather is at its best for cycling and it's Cycle September! DIY - Do it yourself when it works best for you. Make your ride planning easy, whether it be starting in the south or in the north, riding point to point or round trip. Our S2S vision is to enable you to enjoy the a journey on the Razorback Greenway on your own.

Finisher Medals for the DIY Riders can be picked up during the month of September from the following locations!

Fayetteville Parks, M-F 8am-5pm

Fayetteville Visitor’s Center, T-F 10am-5pm and Saturday 9am-1pm

Adventure Subaru, M-F 8am-7pm and Saturday 9am-6pm

Bentonville Community Center, M-Th 8am-7pm and Friday 8am-4pm

Course Details

Use this link to view an interactive map of the Razorback Regional Greenway.

Fall ride information / course details can be viewed using Strava.

START: Sam's Club Home Office in BENTONVILLE (2101 SE Simple Savings Dr)

FINISH: Walker Park in FAYETTEVILLE (10 W 15th Street)

Pit Stops

Rogers Pit Stop is at the Mercy Trailhead, sponsored by Crafton Tull and City of Rogers.7:15-10:00am.

Lowell Pit Stop is across from Northwest Arkansas Board of Realtors, sponsored by NABOR. 7:45-10:45am.

Springdale Pit Stop is at Shiloh Square, sponsored by Downtown Springdale Alliance. 8:00am-12:15pm.

Fayetteville Pit Stop is at Lake Fayetteville’s North Shore, sponsored by McClelland Engineering, 8:30am-1:30pm.

Strava is the recommended app to be used for navigation / activity tracking if you prefer digital/technology platforms. Submitting “proof of ride” is not needed for DIY riders.

Suggested parking locations in Fayetteville (fall ride finish area) can be viewed on this parking map.
